tweet: .@GOP Life gives us many chances to stand up for what is right. If you, like the majority of America, feel it is wrong for children to be snatched from their parents & forced to live in chainlink rooms IE cages, your path is clear. Sign #S3036 today! #KeepFamiliesTogetherAct  https://t.co/Q8cogrXVTE

Americans will be in the streets turning over cars and setting fire to stores because their favourite team won the superbowl but you guys can't get on the ground and tear down those cages and chainlink fences?  https://t.co/HP5YfjLmG7
Just think of them as playpens. Giant, chainlink playpens in the middle of the fucking desert.
